name: SHADOW OF WAR
summary: VR documentary 2024 (Norwegian language). In the VR experience "Shadow of War," 92 year old  time witness Erik Kvaal shares memories from his childhood in Bodø during World War II. This documentary VR experience bring us back to events related to the bombing of Bodø in 1940 and the sinking of the express liner DS Prinsesse Ragnhild that same year.
